text: Carter Campbell (born September 29, 1947) is a former American football defensive end and linebacker. He played for the San Francisco 49ers in 1970, the Denver Broncos in 1971 and for the New York Giants from 1972 to 1973. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:American football defensive ends Category:American football linebackers Category:Weber State Wildcats football players Category:San Francisco 49ers players Category:Denver Broncos players Category:New York Giants players
title: Carter Campbell
